Color Format

Pro Capture Family

Magewell Pro Capture Family support a variety of color formats to meet the diverse needs of users.

  1. MWFOURCC_GREY
  2. MWFOURCC_Y800
  3. MWFOURCC_Y8
  4. MWFOURCC_Y16
  5. MWFOURCC_RGB15
  6. MWFOURCC_RGB16
  7. MWFOURCC_RGB24
  8. MWFOURCC_RGBA
  9. MWFOURCC_ARGB
  10. MWFOURCC_BGR15
  11. MWFOURCC_BGR16
  12. MWFOURCC_BGR24
  13. MWFOURCC_BGRA
  14. MWFOURCC_ABGR
  15. MWFOURCC_NV16
  16. MWFOURCC_NV61
  17. MWFOURCC_I422
  18. MWFOURCC_YV16
  19. MWFOURCC_YUY2
  20. MWFOURCC_YUYV
  21. MWFOURCC_UYVY
  22. MWFOURCC_YVYU
  23. MWFOURCC_VYUY
  24. MWFOURCC_I420
  25. MWFOURCC_IYUV
  26. MWFOURCC_NV12
  27. MWFOURCC_YV12
  28. MWFOURCC_NV21
  29. MWFOURCC_P010
  30. MWFOURCC_P210
  31. MWFOURCC_IYU2
  32. MWFOURCC_V308
  33. MWFOURCC_AYUV
  34. MWFOURCC_UYVA
  35. MWFOURCC_V408
  36. MWFOURCC_VYUA
  37. MWFOURCC_V210
  38. MWFOURCC_Y410
  39. MWFOURCC_V410
  40. MWFOURCC_RGB10
  41. MWFOURCC_BGR10

USB Gen2/Plus Capture Family

USB Gen2/Plus Capture Family are drive-free. Supported color formats are as follows.

  1. MWFOURCC_YUY2
  2. MWFOURCC_UYVY
  3. MWFOURCC_RGB24
  4. MWFOURCC_RGBA
  5. MWFOURCC_NV12
  6. MWFOURCC_I420

Note: NV12 and I420 are supported by USB devices which allow 4K output signals.

Color format-related Functions

  1. FOURCC_IsRGB
  2. FOURCC_IsPacked
  3. FOURCC_GetBpp
  4. FOURCC_CalcMinStride
  5. FOURCC_CalcImageSize
  6. FOURCC_IsMask
  7. FOURCC_GetFromBitmapHeader
